Introduction To Fabrication

Prototypes need to be created, motors have to be mounted, enclosures must be built. Understanding how things are fabricated makes you a better maker.

Ribbon Bracelet Flashlight

10 September 2017

For the flashlight project, I wanted to make a flashlight that is lightweight and easy to carry. With that goal in mind, I gravitated towards making small scale object and using soft materials. I came up with ideas like keychain made of cloth, pen flashlight, and paper lantern flashlight. In...
